title: The Sharks
creator_credit: Nicolas Noxon and National Geographic Society
brief_description: Not all sharks are dangerous to humans. Observing sharks around the world, the film addresses humankind’s fear and hatred of sharks and offers facts - about the shark’s anatomy, behaviour, and vulnerability to people.
